headline: Gold Prices Tumble. What the Latest Tariff News Means for Newmont and Other Stocks.
summary: Shares of  Newmont  the Colorado-based gold miner, fell Monday and  gold futures  slumped after the U.S. and China agreed to slash tariffs on each other’s goods for 90 days and continue trade talks.  Continuous gold futures fell 3.1% to $3,240 per Troy ounce, with investors pivoting to risk-on assets in response to the deal between Washington and Beijing.  The move lower put gold on course for its lowest closing price since April 10.

The move lower put gold on course for its lowest closing price since April 10.

headline: Newmont Stock Falls as Gold Prices Tumble After U.S.-China Tariff Deal
summary: Shares of  Newmont  the Colorado-based gold miner, fell in premarket trading Monday as gold futures slumped after the U.S. and China agreed to slash tariffs on each other’s goods for 90 days and continue trade talks.  Continuous gold futures fell 3.5% to $3,227 per Troy ounce, with investors pivoting to risk-on assets in response to the deal between Washington and Beijing.

raw.headline: Newmont Stock Falls as Gold Prices Tumble After U.S.-China Tariff Deal
raw.summary: Shares of  Newmont  the Colorado-based gold miner, fell in premarket trading Monday as gold futures slumped after the U.S. and China agreed to slash tariffs on each other’s goods for 90 days and continue trade talks.  Continuous gold futures fell 3.5% to $3,227 per Troy ounce, with investors pivoting to risk-on assets in response to the deal between Washington and Beijing.
